articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: BBC signs new four-year audio deal for ICC events
articles.description: The BBC signs a new four-year audio deal with the International Cricket Council (ICC) to broadcast all major global tournaments.
articles.content:
The BBC has signed a new four-year audio deal with the International Cricket Council (ICC) to broadcast all major global tournaments. 
It means the BBC will have ball-by-ball commentary on every tou… [+1407 chars]

articles.title: College pays tribute to teenager killed in crash
articles.description: Dafydd Hûw Craven-Jones, 18, and his front-seat passenger died after a single-vehicle crash on Saturday
articles.content:
Shyamantha Asokan,BBC News, West Midlands
Dafydd Hûw Craven-Jones (left), who studied at Ellesmere College, and Morgan Jones died in the crash on Saturday
